‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖFor Support and Feedback‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ 
contact@rnftechnologies.com 
http://www.facebook.com/Phonato

‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖMore About Roulette‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ
Roulette is a casino game named after a French diminutive for little wheel. In the game, players may choose to place roulette bets on either a single number or a range of numbers, the colors red or black, or whether the number is odd or even. The roulette odds are based on probability.

To determine the winning number and color, a croupier spins a wheel in one direction, then spins a ball in the opposite direction around a tilted circular track running around the circumference of the wheel. The ball eventually loses momentum and falls on to the wheel and into one of 37 (in French/European roulette) or 38 (in American roulette) colored and numbered pockets on the wheel.

Roulette players have a variety of betting options. Placing inside roulette bets is either selecting the exact number of the pocket the ball will land in, or a small range of pockets based on their proximity on the layout. Players wishing to bet on the 'outside' will select roulette bets on larger positional groupings of pockets, the pocket color, or whether the winning number is odd or even. The payout roulette odds for each type of bet are based on its probability.

The roulette table usually imposes minimum and maximum bets, and these rules usually apply separately for all of a player's inside and outside roulette bets for each spin. For inside roulette bets at roulette tables, some casinos may use separate roulette table chips of various colors to distinguish players at the table. Players can continue to place roulette bets as the ball spins around the wheel until the dealer announces no more roulette bets.

When a winning number and color is determined by the roulette wheel, the dealer will place a marker, also known as a dolly, on that winning number on the roulette table layout. When the dolly is on the table, no players may place roulette bets, collect roulette bets, or remove any roulette bets from the table. The dealer will then sweep away all other losing roulette bets either by hand or rake, and determine all of the payouts to the remaining inside and outside winning roulette bets. When the dealer is finished making payouts, the marker is removed from the roulette board where players collect their winnings and make new bets. The winning chips remain on the roulette board.

Roulette wheel number sequence

The pockets of the roulette wheel are numbered from 1 to 36.
In number ranges from 1 to 10 and 19 to 28, odd numbers are red and even are black. In ranges from 11 to 18 and 29 to 36, odd numbers are black and even are red.
There is a green pocket numbered 0 (zero). In American roulette, there is a second green pocket marked 00.

Definition of bets on French roulette.
PROOF  A full number: 35  x bet
CAVAL  Two neighboring numbers: 17  x bet
TRASVERSALE FULL  Three numbers on the same horizontal line: 11  x bet
CARR√â  Four united numbers: 8  x bet
PRIME FIRST FIRST FIRST  The first four numbers (0,1,2,3): 8  x bet

COLONNA A column of twelve numbers: 2  x bet

RED OR BLACK OR BLACK 1  x bet
PARES OR DISPARTS 1  x bet

Roulette information.
In the European roulette, the wheel contains 37 numbered boxes from zero to 36. This means that players have better chances than other roulette tables, such as the American one, which has more boxes.
The two main sections of the table on which the stakes are placed are the internal and external parts. Each one offers different betting modes.
The inner part offers bets on single numbers or groups of numbers that are close to each other on the table layout for up to six numbers with a single episode.
The exterior offers the possibility to focus on pairs of options such as: red or black, high or low or even and odd or odd (each of which covers 18 numbers). You can also make six different episodes of 12 numbers (divided into two types, three columns and three dozens).
In addition, betting groups of 7 to 17 numbers are available, placed on different wheel segments. These bets can be placed by clicking on the outer oval (' racetrack'), the part of the table that reproduces exactly the order in which the numbers are shown on the wheel, unlike the numerical order in which the numbers are placed in the main layout for bets.

title: Roulette Offline Online
description:
In the game, players may choose to place bets on either a single number or a range of numbers, the colors red or black, or whether the number is odd or even, or if the numbers are high (19‚Äì36) or low (1‚Äì18).

To determine the winning number and color, a croupier spins a wheel in one direction, then spins a ball in the opposite direction around a tilted circular track running around the circumference of the wheel. The ball eventually loses momentum and falls onto the wheel and into one of 37 (in French/European roulette) or 38 (in American roulette) colored and numbered pockets on the wheel.

Roulette players have a variety of betting options. Placing inside bets is either selecting the exact number of the pocket the ball will land in, or a small range of pockets based on their proximity on the layout. Players wishing to bet on the 'outside' will select bets on larger positional groupings of pockets, the pocket color, or whether the winning number is odd or even.[5] The payout odds for each type of bet are based on its probability.

The roulette table usually imposes minimum and maximum bets, and these rules usually apply separately for all of a player's inside and outside bets for each spin. For inside bets at roulette tables, some casinos may use separate roulette table chips of various colors to distinguish players at the table. Players can continue to place bets as the ball spins around the wheel until the dealer announces no more bets or rien ne va plus.

Croupier's rake pushing chips across a roulette layout
When a winning number and color is determined by the roulette wheel, the dealer will place a marker, also known as a dolly, on that winning number on the roulette table layout. When the dolly is on the table, no players may place bets, collect bets, or remove any bets from the table. The dealer will then sweep away all other losing bets either by hand or rake, and determine all of the payouts to the remaining inside and outside winning bets. When the dealer is finished making payouts, the marker is removed from the board where players collect their winnings and make new bets. The winning chips remain on the board.
summary: Roulette is a casino game named after the French word meaning little wheel.

title: Roulette wheel
description:
This application is a software implementation of a roulette wheel. You can apply not only to play, but also in the study probability theory.
Each time you touch the screen, there is a random selection of numbers from 0 to 36.
Roulette table (on two sheets of A4 format) can be downloaded here:
http://t-dos.ru/desk.pdf or http://t-dos.ru/desk.doc
Our program is not used pseudorandom generator, the algorithm of the program is implemented by a random function which is calculated from the current time (using only milliseconds). This means that fully meets the high requirements that apply to such a game algorithms. Build a distribution curve and see for yourself.
No ads.

title: Mini Roulette Table Croupier
description:
Realistic Las Vegas Roulette In Stunning HD


Mini Roulette Table Croupier is a Las Vegas inspired casino game that comes to life on your Android device. Now you can have the thrill of placing big bets, spinning the wheel and winning huge amounts right in the palm of your hand. No need to risk any real money to have hours of exciting casino roulette action. This is the perfect app for learning how to play the game and for getting your strategy right before making real money wagers in a real casino.


*** Game Features ***


** Realistic Vegas style roulette action
** American roulette wheel and layout
** Casino sounds and music makes you feel like you‚Äôre playing in a real casino
** Board that displays the last 7 numbers spun
** Compete against friends, family or stranger from around the world for high score bragging rights


Roulette is French for ‚Äúlittle wheel‚Äù. The modern day layout we find in most casinos dates back to the 17th century. American roulette tables has 38 numbers including a single zero and double zero. The croupier starts the spin by launching the ball that eventually lands in one the the numbered slots on the wheel. When a winning number and color is determined by where the ball landed on the roulette wheel, the croupier will place a marker, also known as a dolly, on that winning number on the roulette table layout. The croupier will then sweep away all other losing roulette bets either by hand or rake. When the croupier is finished making payouts, the marker is removed from the roulette board where players collect their winnings and make new bets.


No need to look for a biased wheel when playing this app. Also there is no need to use losing betting systems like the Martingale or Fibonacci. Since you are not playing for real money, the pressure of winning is lifted and you can have fun watching the wheel spin and hopefully landing in your slot.


Step up to the Vegas style roulette table and start placing your bets. Watch the croupier spin the wheel with the same level of excitement as being in a real casino. If you were playing European roulette in places like France, you would here terms such as partage, carre, cheval and boule. This app does not use a European wheel or layout, it‚Äôs all American.


Download Mini Roulette Table Croupier Now!

Website: www.gurkinapps.com

title: Roulette Pattern Finder for Outside Bets
description:
The Roulette Pattern Finder is a simple app to help you identify patterns in the outside bets of the roulette table. You can easily see patterns forming and depending on your betting style you can bet with, or against the pattern.

There are many advanced Roulette Analyzers Apps online but the Roulette Pattern Finder is designed for simplicity. You can very quickly see any patterns forming without over complicating things as other calculators and predictors do. This is important, considering time limits in between spins. The Roulette Pattern Finder allows you to quickly see patterns and still have the time to place your bets. 

The Roulette Pattern Finder can be used well with martingale strategies for identifying an entry point. But you should research and understand this risks of martingale strategies before using that method. You should know your casino's minimum and maximum outside bets, and calculate how much your account balance can handle. Remember, every spin of the roulette table does not remember the previous spin and does not care about the last 5, 10, or a 1000 spins. So there is never a guarantee, and the Roulette Pattern Finder makes makes no claim to have a winning strategy , it is simply a tool to use with your current strategy.

Note that some Casinos will not allow the use of mobile phones around their tables.

Also note that the app uses a standard table layout used by most casinos and online tables. I have noticed that some apps have an incorrect table layout that produces the wrong colors on some numbers. French, American, and European roulette wheels all use the the same table layout, it is only some apps that have it wrong. To be sure you can check that your Casino App has the correct colors for each number. When you click on the New Spin button in this App the table layout will be shown for you to select a number. Compare this layout to your Casino App Layout.
summary: Tool for identifying patterns forming in the outside bets of the roulette table.

title: Roulette 2018
description:
Roulette is a casino game named after the French word meaning little wheel. In the game, players may choose to place bets on either a single number or a range of numbers, the colors red or black, or whether the number is odd or even, or if the numbers are high (19‚Äì36) or low (1‚Äì18).

To determine the winning number and color, a croupier spins a wheel in one direction, then spins a ball in the opposite direction around a tilted circular track running around the circumference of the wheel. The ball eventually loses momentum and falls onto the wheel and into one of 37 (in French/European roulette) or 38 (in American roulette) colored and numbered pockets on the wheel.

features
* Straight/Single	
  ->Bet on a single number	
   -->Entirely within the square for the chosen number
* Split	
  ->Bet on two vertically/horizontally adjacent numbers (e.g. 14-17 or 8-9)	
   -->On the edge shared by the numbers
* Street	
  ->Bet on three consecutive numbers in a horizontal line (e.g. 7-8-9)	
   -->On the outer edge of the number at either end of the line
* Corner/Square	->Bet on four numbers that meet at one corner (e.g. 10-11-13-14)	
   -->On the common corner
* Six Line/Double Street	
  ->Bet on six consecutive numbers that form two horizontal lines (e.g. 31-32-33-34-35-36)
   -->On the outer corner shared by the two leftmost or the two rightmost numbers
* Trio	A three-number 
  ->bet that involves at least one zero: 0-1-2 (either layout); 0-2-3 (single-zero only); 0-00-2 or 00-2-3 (double-zero only)	
   -->On the corner shared by the three chosen numbers
* Basket/First Four	
  ->Bet on 0-1-2-3 (Single-zero layout only)	
   -->On the outer corner shared by 0-1 or 0-3

When a winning number and color is determined by the roulette wheel, the dealer will place a marker, also known as a dolly, on that winning number on the roulette table layout. When the dolly is on the table, no players may place roulette bets, collect roulette bets, or remove any roulette bets from the table. The dealer will then sweep away all other losing roulette bets either by hand or rake, and determine all of the payouts to the remaining inside and outside winning roulette bets. When the dealer is finished making payouts, the marker is removed from the roulette board where players collect their winnings and make new bets. The winning chips remain on the roulette board.

title: Russian Roulette
description:
Russian roulette is a deadly game of chance where 1 or more players can play the game. To play the game you need to place atleast one bullet in the gun and then spin the cylinder so the location of the bullet is unknown. After that the player playing the turn has to place the muzzle of the gun against his head and pull the trigger. If the bullet gets shot he dies else he survives. 

There are different variants of the game 

1) Single player mode 
where you just load the bullet spin cylinder and pull trigger to see if the bullet gets shot.

2) Multi Player Mode
Where we have 2 player , 6 player and 8 player modes and each mode has a different gun to play with.

 In the 2 player Mode we use the double barrel shot gun where you enter the name of the players and spin the gun to determine the players chance. then the player needs to shoot to see if he survives.

In the 6 Player Mode we use the normal Revolver which has a 6 slot cylinder in it. Player can place upto 6 bullets in this mode and 2 to 6 players can play this mode. Where again everyone enters their names and spins the revolver to see if whoes turn it is and last man standing wins the game. You can also place more than one bullet to change the probability of shot for example in a 6 player game if we place 3 bullets out of 6 possible you change the probability to survive to 0.5.


In the 8 Player Mode we use the special revolver having a 8 slot cylinder which can load upto 8 bullets and hence upto 8 players can play this game.

More than 8 players can also play by refilling the bullets multiple times.

Dont forget to check the leader board in the end!
summary: Russian roulette is a game of chance. Try it to see how lucky you are today.

title: Roulette
description:
Roulette is a casino game named after a French diminutive for little wheel. In the game, players may choose to place bets on either a single number or a range of numbers, the colors red or black, or whether the number is odd or even.

To determine the winning number and color, a croupier spins a wheel in one direction, then spins a ball in the opposite direction around a tilted circular track running around the circumference of the wheel. The ball eventually loses momentum and falls onto the wheel and into one of 37 colored and numbered pockets on the wheel.

Roulette is a casino game!
You can bet on numbers, red or black, odd or even!!!

description:
Designed BY casino professionals, FOR casino professionals.

ARE YOU A ROULETTE DEALER?

Would you like to learn and practice ROULETTE TIMES TABLES, PICTURE BETS and PAYOUT SCENARIOS, by seeing gorgeous renderings of 3D chips on a realistic roulette layout?

THIS is the app for YOU!

I learned how to deal roulette over 25 years ago. Back then, I used paper and a pen to learn my roulette times tables and picture bets, and it was SO hard! I designed this app to make it much easier, and much more fun, for YOU. All the best, Cathryn Leasure.

WHAT‚ÄôS IN THE APP

AMERICAN OR EUROPEAN ROULETTE
The app is separated into two sections; American Roulette and European Roulette. 
American roulette layout has a single zero, AND a double zero.
European roulette layout has only a single zero. 


ROULETTE TIMES TABLES

Learn, and practice, roulette times tables, by seeing 3D chips on a realistic layout.
17 times table (splits)
35 times table (straight ups)
8 times table (corners)
11 times table (streets)
5 times table (six lines)
6 times table (top five) ‚Äì American Roulette only


PICTURE BETS

Learn and practice picture bets.

Picture bets are the key to being able to add up payouts quickly. The more picture bets you memorize, the faster you‚Äôll be able to add up bets.

I‚Äôve included names for the picture bets, to help you remember them.


PAYOUT SCENARIOS

Start out easy by choosing to see chips on the layout in only the split and straight up positions.

The app will randomly generate bets for you.

Then, add more chip positions to each bet (corner, street, six line, and in American roulette, the top five) to make bets more difficult.

Each payout scenario can be accessed 'in order' (for learning purposes), and 'random' (for practice).

Soon, you‚Äôll be adding up bets like a pro!


QUICK TIMES TABLES

Ok, you‚Äôve learned all your times tables, but you‚Äôve had a brain fart, and can‚Äôt remember what 14 x 17 is!! 

Find the answer quickly with Quick Times Tables.


APP ORGANIZATION

You can jump anywhere, though if you are just learning how to deal roulette, my suggestion would be to work through the buttons in the order they appear.


FEEDBACK

If you like the app, would you mind leaving great feedback for me please? This will help raise the app in the app store rankings, so more roulette dealers can find it, which will help them out too.

Do you have a suggestion on how to improve the app? I'd love to hear from you.

I WILL find a solution to your problem.


CONTACT

I answer all emails, and I‚Äôd LOVE to hear from you!

Thank you, and all the best in your casino career.
Cathryn Leasure
